title: Perfect location!
text: Really nice hotel with nice size rooms and good beds. Very busy on weekend so breakfast restaurant had up to 25 min wait! But breakfast was superb. The best part of the hotel was the location. Its 2 min walk to MTR and 101 and therefore very convenient. 101 mall has a huge foodcourt with choices for all. Hotel room service was very good too.

text: good place and service .

It was very bad experience I had because the reception person made mistake and put us into wrong rooms.  I reserved twin room for two person, but she insisted they do not have any room available which was not true.  We(three of us) had to stay in twin room which is not comfortable at all.

title: Super Hotel im Business Zentrum von Taipei.
text: Ein wirklich super Hotel. Alles inkl. Service und Restaurants war top! Selber habe ich die Hotebar und das Buffet im Japanischen Restaurant getestet - beides war sehr gut. Pool und Fitnessraum sind gut ausgestattet und ware nicht berfllt. Das Hotel liegt wenige Gehminuten vom 101 Hochhaus entfernt. In direkter Umgebung gibt es ein ausgiebiges Nachtleben, vor allem fr jngere Leute.

title: Perfekt hotell nra njen samt affrsresa
text: Bodde en vecka p det stora och vlfungerande hotell i hjrtat av taipei nra 101. Utmrkt frukost, fin utomhuspool och gym samt nrheten till shopping och njen i hjrtat av taipei. Fint hotell dr dock restaurangerna i hotellet r aningen dyra. God servixe och vacker inredning. Fina rum men inte extraordinra.  Taxikn att lmna hotellet r ofta lng, men det gr arr sjlva plocka upp en p gatan.

title: Perfekt lge fr shopping!
text:
Rummet som vi hade var en Club rum, ca 30 kvm men kndes mycket mindre! Den var ren och frsch men stdningen var inkonsekvent. Pfyllning av frukt och badrums bekvmligheter fylldes p d och d men inte varje dag. 
Trkigt att nattbddning inte gjordes varje kvll.

Hotellets personal r jttetrevliga och hjlpsamma! Club lounge personalen ocks, men hade en incident. Vi skulle ta en kvllscocktail men eftersom det var vr frsta natt s kom vi inte ihg rumsnumret och hade vra pass i vrdeskpet. S vi gav nyckelbrickan s de kunde skanna, det gick bra men de kunde sedan inte kunna ge mig mitt rumsnummer?! S vi fick helt enkelt g runt p vr vning och chansa och skanna varje drr. Och inte bara det, tjejen som hjlpte, gav oss ocks fel bricka tillbaka men fruns nyckel fungerade. Vi ppekade att min nyckel inte fungerade men jag vet inte om det var sprkfrbistring men det lt som jag anklagades fr att ha stulit annan gsts nyckel.

Club lounge personalen var inte tillrckligt hjlpsamma med att visa oss till lediga bord eller fyllde p med mat och dryck tillrckligt snabbt. Det tog slut fort. Men de var trevliga och hjlpsamma, vill jag ppeka! 

Omrdet r perfekt fr shopping! 101 gallerian har de flesta stora mrkesvaror och har en gigantisk foodcourt! 
Omrdet hade skerligen dussin gallerior, som lnkades med en gngbro.
5 min med taxi ligger Rahoe night market.
10 min promenad ligger Zhongxiao rd med massor av butiker och undergound gallerior.

text: Meget bra hotell, store fine rom og god service. Hotellet er moderne og alt er skinnende rent.

text: Kjempefint hotel med super beliggenhet rett ved Taipei 101. Vi hadde rom med fantastisk utsikt til trnet. Lobby og restaurant var veldig flott samt at hotellet hadde bra treningsrom og fint bassengomrde. Kort avstand til T-bane, shopping, Taipei 101, etc.

title: Hotel is good but Hotels.com is bad
text: Hotels.com keeps sending me emails for a review which is super annoying...

title: Excellent
text:
We just wanted a slow relaxing holiday and was very impressed by the service staffs, specially rendered from Roger of the front reception. he is awesome & tried his best to be attentive as well as making suggestions. Pool was warm though it's an outdoor pool.

Thumbs up! Roger keep it up.

title: Perfect everything
text: luxi and Comfortable
This hotel was OUTSTANDING! It was like staying at the Ritz.  Terrific location next to Taipei 101, near shopping, excellent bellhops / taxi service. Would love to go back for longer.

title: Spooky nights
text:
Location of the hotel was great, very central.  The facilities in the rooms were good, the staff  gave good service.  
However the coffee shop at breakfast time was very crowded on the weekend, I have never seen such long queues waiting to get into the coffee shop for breakfast.  After I had made the booking, a friend told us that's her husband and friends had stayed at this hotel before, but they were so disturbed by paranormal activities in the room, they changed hotels.  
I had to unscrew a light bulb on my first night, even though all the lights were switched off, one floor light would flash intermittently.  On the second night As I was trying to sleep, I was disturbed by the sound of someone breathing next to my right ear, my husband was sleeping on my left.  I will not be going back to this hotel.

title: Great Stay
text: Superb hotel adjacent to the wonderful 101 Building. We chose a room with a view of the 101 Building and we were not disappointed.

title: Fab pride weekend
text: Really lovely hotel with great staff airport limo was amazing

title: Our luxury experience!
text: Wonderful stay, centrally located. A real luxury hotel. The spa is amazing and they have a great pool! Expensive dining options, but its walking distance to tons of other restaurants, including an outdoor market!

title: Great stay at the Grand Hyatt
text: Was raining during my total 3 day stay but the stay at the Grand Hyatt was very pleasent. Really liked their gym and sauna facility

title: Wonderful hotel
text: Friendly at reception. Professional services. However, the terrible experience at breakfast table makes me think twice before I choose this hotel again!
Rooms comfortable and spacious food good helpful staff. Within walking distance of several areas.
Nice room, nice restaurants, nice location, friendly and helpful staff

title: Comfy stay~
text: Very comfortable hotel with friendly staff. Nice hot area with hot tub and well equipped gym.

title: All good
text: Great location, good service, good gym - and great restaurants

title: Perfect business stay
text: Fantastic overall as usual. Only unexpected observation was the below standard bed making - sheets not properly pulled, not tucked in etc.

title: Short Holiday In Taipei
text: Location was excellent, near Taipei 101, many shopping malls and shops, as well as many types of restaurants etc.  The room could have been a little bigger, unusually small for a Hyatt room, plus the room could use more lighting at the desk, a little too dark, as well as a mirror at the desk (there was a large LED TV instead).  The only mirror outside the bathroom was near the door but the hair dryer plug did not reach.

title: True 5 Star hotel in Heart of Taipei
text: Grand Hyatt Taipei, is a great hotel, extremely well located in the heart of the city. It is just 3 - 4 minutes from Taipei 101 and also from the MRT station. Also, the airport shuttle bus stops right in front of the hotel. The hotel true to the hotel rating is huge, with 5 star facilities. The Gym and the spa are great but did not much like to swimming pool which was average to say the least. While everything about the hotel is great but we just felt that it was a bit cold and contrary to everyone in Taipei being so warm, the staff were professional but not warm and friendly. As I stay in many places around the world, I could compare and more so I felt everyone in Taipei is extra warm and friendly but in Grand Hyatt Taipei, the staff may need some orientation on this aspect.

title: Nice hotel
text:
It was great place and breakfast was good.

Deposit return is quite late and it took 3 weeks but not yet canceled. other than this issue, everything was good
Friendly staff  comfortable bed
I gave my comment to the hotel upon my departure

title: Amazing
text: in one word, amazing

title: Very Slow Check-In Process
text: Check-in was slow. They made us wait for an hour. If I did not notify the hotel that I was with my 85-year-old mother, they would have just let us wait at the lobby for one more hour. Two hours of waiting is too much, and that means two hours taken off from one day of our stay, considering that the rooms are priced above average. I also had a hard time booking a table for two at their buffet restaurant (Cafe). However, when I told the Reservations Officer that we were able to book a table in buffet restaurant another 5-Star hotel, they suddenly found a table for us. And that was weird. If not for the close up window view of the Taipei 101, I would not recommend this hotel to my relatives and friends at all. Well, at least this hotel has something to boast of, and that is the view of the Taipei 101.
Normal high-end hotel.

title: Family vacation to Taipei
text: Location is fantastic as right across the street from Taipei 101 and the district is nice and clean. Taipei 101 has the MRT station which can take you anywhere in Taipei. Taipei 101 also has a Ding Tai Fung, so its perfect start to the trip. Staff is very nice and helpful and breakfast buffet is great. Overall a perfect place for vacation or business stay in Taipei.

We had a great time at Grand Hyatt Taipei. It is located right next  to the iconic 101 Tower and just 5 minutes from the subway. I have always been impressed with Hyatt chain and have stayed with them for many years previously. The high quality of their service and amenities have been consistent all these years. Their beds, bed linen and bath towels are superbly comfortable and plush. 
The Grand Hyatt Taipei is one of their best examples. The design and quality of the hotel building are outstanding. I like in particular their color scheme which is a pleasing combination of beige and brown. This seems to be the Hyatt theme. Very soothing after a long flight or day. 
The service was outstanding. We were checked in (by Shelley) in less than 3 minutes. That's fantastic service. She was  very professional and friendly. 
The bell service sent up our bags very fast as well. 
The room has full amenities. I would like to mention that info addition to the usual , the room had rain shower and an Elly coffee machine. Very well appointed. 
There is a number of good restaurants in the hotel. The irodori Japanese restaurant is recommended. 
We had a wonderful stay. Will be back

title: Excellent
text: Comfortable room, friendly staff and convenient location.

title: Lovely short stay
text: One-night stay made memorable by the impeccable service and the complimentary upgrade to an executive suite. The location is  great if youre into shopping, but if youre not into that, the hotel is close to two subway stations and theres plenty of taxis to get you to places. Croissants at the ground floor baguette taste wonderful.

title: Good for family trip
text: The hotel lives up to its name. 3 of us stayed in one room, and the sofa bed they provided was actually pretty comfortable. They placed it right next to the window so it was a bit chilly at night, but it was at a level I could definitely live with. It is literally 3 minutes away from Taipei 101, and we could see it right outside the window. Transportation was therefore convenient, breakfast selection was wide and delicious, and their free sauna was a godsend after each day of constant walking. Will definitely be back!
It was raining in Taipei  during our 3 nights stay. The hotel is linked to the 101 tower and huge modern shopping complex so we were dry to dine and shop

title: Great hotel
text:
Very comfortable, convenient and accommodating hotel. Front desk staffs are very friendly and concierge was very helpful. They accommodated my extra bed and late checkout with no extra charges. 

The 101 mall and MTR was just round the corner.  I will definitely recommend this hotel!

title: Great hotel at an unbeatble location
text: Very enjoyable stay. Room is spacious for its location. Location is great and close to MTR station. Staff are all friendly.

title: Nice staff
text: Attentive , warm staff. Perfect location

title: Facility
text: Great sauna facility
Nice location thank you

Very long queue at check in 

Expensive drinks and room service 

Rest well/very well
Good location

title: Excellent stay
text: Nice location next to Taipei 101.  Accessible to the metro and the breakfast was amazing.

title: A pleasant stay
text:
It's a very large modern hotel in a good location for restaurants  bars and shopping, next to 101.
Try the food court in the 101 amazing choice.
As it's such a large hotel it can be a little impersonal, however the staff are extremely friendly and helpful and the rooms very comfortable.
Good location and vey nice hotel.
Great Location !   Experienced and Excellent Staff and service.   We'll definitely recommend hotel to friends visiting Taiwan.

title: Political leaning hotel?
text: Your hotel is amazing--super location and very clean, good service, and attractive. I have one concern: I noticed that the TVs in the lobby had Fox News and the Wall Street Journal was available free at the hotel. I wonder if those choices indicate a political leaning--if so, I find that unacceptable and would no longer stay at your hotel.
Location is excellent! Room is very comfortable, I will definitely  stay here again.

title: Will be back ...
text: Great location connected with a footbridge to Taipei 101. Staffs are professional,  the concierge is very helpful and housekeeping ladies are very friendly. The room is a clean and suitable size. This was an overall great stay. We will definitely book the Grand Hyatt again when visiting Taipei. Cannot comment on the breakfast as it was not included with my reservation. I preferred to eat local street food breakfast like the warm soy milk and youtiao.
Check in was way too long... two days before new year!! Find a better system!
Excellent
The room was good except for the smell.

title: Average stay
text: Cold shower, inefficient check out, certain restaurants closed to guests. Really good looking hotel and generally tolerable but really for the price it is nowhere near worth it.

title: Taipei Hotel with Great Rooms
text: this is a great hotel in a central location.  Room was nice, breakfast was wonderful

title: Taipei Hyatt
text: Hotel is in a great loction, close to attractions and business. Having Taipei 101 across the street was great with its expansive food court and great restaurants.

title: Best hotel
text: Best Location. Best area. Good services and food

title: A pleasant stay...
text:
Hotel has fantastic facilities and many high end restaurants with different cuisines.  Location is central, next to Taipei 101.

Rooms are modern and clean with comfortable beds and pillows. The bathrooms have good water flow with consistent temperature.

A complimentary birthday cake was provided to our surprise. It was an excellent and thoughtful gesture.

However, at this price range, things get very competitive. And its only minor nitpicking details that one has to compare with the competition. 

Overall service of all the staff in the hotel falls noticeably short compared to the competition. I would almost described most of them as just ever so slightly blur in regards to their surroundings and guests. This is unusual for a 5 star hotel. 

And no one is honestly expecting service at ones feet, just routine things like refilling water or helping guests with luggage. 

Room is small for the price. There are undoubtedly better options in Taipei, and I travel here routinely at least once a month for several days at a time. 

So it just depends. Its a great hotel overall with top end facilities, cleanliness, restaurants, but lacks that top end refinement in terms of its staff, and rooms perhaps are not as much value as other choices out there. 

These are minor criticisms and overall, and its really just nitpicking when comparing to other 5 star hotels in the area of the same price range. 

Ultimately, one would not be disappointed by the stay.

title: good stat
text: The room is big. Check in service is professional. Nice breakfast buffet

title: Enjoyable stay
text: Stayed 3 nights. The hotel location is excellent. Next to Taipei 101 and metro station. Very convenient for food and shopping. Staff are friendly and helpful. Check in was smooth and quick. The room was spacious. Bed was comfortable but the pillows were too soft. The water pressure of the shower was weak which was annoying. Overall an enjoyable stay.

title: "Great Hotel, Perfect Location"
text: Everything is excellent. Specially their breakfast buffet, must try.

The lobby, downstairs areas, breakfast buffet, and restaurants were lovely. Location also great. My eighth floor room was OK, but not great for the price. I could tell the room had been cleaned, yet there were hairs on the furniture, and crumbs on the couch, and one of the window blinds was broken.

title: Recommended hotel
text: Good hotel, great location, lovely rooms, very good breakfast.
The breakfast buffet is amazing!! Staff was able to help me find things to do in Taipei and very friendly.

title: PERFECT!
text: Great service, great food, very good location
Over all is very good.  Will stay at this hotel again for next visit.

title: Five star
text: Free upgrade to executive suite woohoo! Although I guess it was because they were fully booked... Anyway everything was superb, as its supposed to be for a five star hotel, the cleanliness, the amenities, the service, I cannot think of any imperfections.

title: Excellent stay conveniently near great places
text: Clean and quiet. Very close to night market and local markets. Right mext door to Taipei 101 malll
more than expect
The receptionist is very professional. The hotel is well designed. I had a room with window view toward Taipei 101 which is marvelous.

title: Good for business
text: Situated in the prime commercial area. Easy access to metro stations. Lots of restaurants nearby with various choice of cuisines and bars.

My daughter and I were very pleased with our stay at the Grand Hyatt! Very clean and excellent service, with a very beautiful lobby! They sent a birthday cake for my daughter and it was delicious! The breakfast buffet was superb and had a lot of choices. Walking distance to the Taipei 101 mall. I would definitely stay here again!

title: Cozy staying
text: Pretty nice and clean room. Staffs are polite and professional. Very spacious room.
Great hotel, helpful staff.

title: Value for Money!
text: Weve had an amazing stay at the hotel. Staffs were friendly, helpful and polite. Hotel room was also clean and very comfortable. They also provided a set of toothbrush, cup, toothpaste and a little teddy bear for our 5 year old, which was a really sweet gesture. Will definitely love to revisit again!

title: Top pick!
text: I highly recommend staying at this hotel its comfortable, the service is excellent, pool is lovely. Be sure to take advantage of the onsite breakfast! I will be sure to stay here again when I return to Taipei.

title: Great hotel
text: Great hotel! Best services and professional staff!

title: Great hotel for enjoying Taipei
text: Excellent location near MRT Redline, convenient access to all the shopping Taipei 101 and nearby districts have to offer, outstanding room and service.

title: Meh
text: Grand club staff needs better training; underwhelmed.

title: Excellent stay
text:
it was an excellent stay.  I was with my 84 years old mom and we were allowed to check in early and a provision for 1300hr check out.

The express check out is a breeze

Location is perfect and just across Taipei 101
101 food court 10
Everything good except the long line up at check in and check out.
best hotel in Taipei good location Thanks for upgrading my hotel roomwill stay in this hotel again for sure

title: As expected
text: Hotel service as expected. Convenient location for shoppers.
Nice
The room was very tidy and clean. And the location of the hotel was so convenient for shopping and very close to the MRT station.
8/8Jacky()!!spa!!

title: too many ppl at all facilities , its overwhelming
text: Room has been refurbished and its comfortable , there were way too many ppl at the pool and you have to be on the waiting list to use the spa and there was a huge line for the breakfast and had to wait for more than 40 mins to get in so we missed the breakfast . No free bottle water at turn down , way too many ppl at the spa area .
Taipei 101, , ,

title: Overall okay
text: Water pressure at the shower not enough.  Water temperature at the bath tub is not hot at all, I had to boil the water with the water pot by myself for many times so as to fill the bath tub with hot water.  Never experienced this in any other 5 stars hotels before.  Staff not really helpful, like when we asked them about bus schedule to the airport they just said bus departing per 30 minutes but they had no clue about what is exact schedule is and also not wanted to entertain us at all, later on I could easily find on google, it was okay I can find out by myself however it's not proactive at all.  The location and hardware of the hotel was overall good.
